reasoning: KS incidence strongly linked to HIV/AIDS prevalence. Global incidence ~2.5 per 100k in 2005, with dramatic variation: <0.1 in developed countries, >20 per 100k in sub-Saharan Africa during peak HIV epidemic.
source: Parkin DM et al. Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 2005;55(2):74-108
